metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare's unified security platform simplifies and delivers security everywhere across the Internet, networks, and employees. Regain control with Cloudflare.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

psaBanner.text: Need Help Eliminating VPN Vulnerabilities Immediately?

leftHalf.title: Everywhere Security
leftHalf.copy:
Most IT and security architectures are too complex and disjointed to enforce controls everywhere they need to be, slowing down business.

Cloudflare unifies security everywhere across the Internet, employees and corporate network, so you can accelerate growth.

relatedBlades.title: Complex & disjointed security creates attack opportunities
relatedBlades.copy:
Defending against cyber attacks has too often required manually stitching together siloed tools with limited visibility and imprecise controls across environments. 

All this complexity has led to overworked teams, widening vulnerabilities, more damaging attacks, and an unsustainable level of resources just to keep up with yesterday's threats.

imageAssetFile.altText: Complex & disjointed security creates opportunities for attackers
imageAssetFile.title: Complex & disjointed security creates opportunities for attackers

contentfulAsset.description: Complex & disjointed security creates opportunities for attackers

columnContent.title: Attack surfaces are expanding
columnContent.description: Hybrid work and modern API-first app development mean more entry points for attackers to target with an ever expanding arsenal of attacks.

columnContent.title: Too hard to manage
columnContent.description: Outdated and bloated security stacks with too many point solutions make it hard for teams to know how to protect their business.

columnContent.title: Innovation outpaces security
columnContent.description: Investing in new digital experiences and emerging technologies like AI introduces new risks. Security must evolve alongside business needs.

relatedBlades.title: Simplify and deliver security everywhere with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.copy:
Regain control and unify security with Cloudflare to protect the Internet, employees, and the corporate network everywhere:

- Throughout IT environments
- Across the attack lifecycle
- Around the world

Enforce protections from one unified, intelligent platform of programmable cloud-native services.

imageAssetFile.altText: Simplify your approach and deliver security everywhere with Cloudflare

contentfulAsset.description: Simplify your approach and deliver security everywhere with Cloudflare

columnContent.title: One unified & composable platform
columnContent.description: Converge web app and API protection (WAAP), security services edge (SSE), email security & more. Adopt new capabilities in any order with limitless interoperability and flexible integrations.

columnContent.title: Mass scale threat intelligence
columnContent.description: Cloudflare sees more, so you can protect more. Real-time visibility across 20% of the Internet and 2TB DNS queries / day powers AI/ML-back models that defend against emerging threats.

columnContent.title: Built for scale
columnContent.description: Every service is available to run locally across our %{DataCenterCount} network locations in over %{CountryCount} countries. Single-pass inspection and policy enforcement is always fast, consistent, and resilient.

relatedBlades.title: Lifecycle of a cyberattack
relatedBlades.description: Point solutions with traditional flat network architectures make it easier for threat actors across the cyberattack lifecycle:

image.title: IT Environment - Lifecycle of a cyber attack

columnContent.title: 1. Discover
columnContent.description: Attackers begin by discovering some vulnerability in your attack surface.

columnContent.title: 2. Compromise
columnContent.description: Attackers then exploit a vulnerability or security gap to gain a foothold in your IT environment.

columnContent.title: 3. Lateral movement
columnContent.description: Once inside, attackers often need to move laterally within your environment to reach their desired target.

columnContent.title: 4. Exfil / extort
columnContent.description: After getting where they want to go, attackers leave with your money or data - or leave your business in disarray via sabotage.

relatedBlades.title: Everywhere Security
relatedBlades.description: Cloudflare helps organizations across every stage of the attack lifecycle by offering a single composable platform and network to connect and protect their users, apps, and networks, across any endpoint or infrastructure in any location

columnContent.title: 1. Minimize attack surface
columnContent.description: Minimize attack surface by hiding customer IP addresses, configurations, and IT assets.

columnContent.title: 2. Prevent initial compromise
columnContent.description: Protect the entire corporate network and everything a customer connects to the Internet with L3-L7 services.

columnContent.title: 3. Eliminate lateral movement
columnContent.description: Eliminate lateral movement with the Zero Trust best practices of default-deny and least-privilege.

columnContent.title: 4. Stop exfiltration & extortion
columnContent.description: Regain visibility and control over data to stop exfiltration, fraud, and mitigate exposure risk.

features.title: Carrefour
features.description: Cloudflare's unified security platform slashes Carrefour's incident resolution time by 75%, saving time and money while enhancing the customer experience.

features.title: Japan Airlines
features.description: Cloudflare helps Japan Airlines block ~22K malicious emails over one six-month period and streamlines security efficiency.

features.title: GPC
features.description: Cloudflare protects 900+ GPC websites, giving them complete visibility into threats across their entire digital footprint.

features.title: The State of Arizona
features.description: Cloudflare protects offices for 100+ U.S. civilian agencies with DNS filtering.

features.title: DHL
features.description: Cloudflare helps DHL Parcel protect customer data and client communications.

features.title: Bouvet
features.description: Cloudflare helps Bouvet modernize threat defense across employees and infrastructure.
